Package org.jogger

Entry point classes (such as Jogger and JoggerServer) used to configure and run a web application.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JoggerFactory Implementations of this interface are used by the JoggerServer to create an instance of the Jogger class.
RouteHandler This interface is used in Jogger to create routes easily using anonymous classes.
 

Class Summary
AssetRequestExecutor This class is responsible of executing requests for static assets.
Environment Helper class that provides methods to check the environment in which Jogger is working.
ExceptionHandler Used by the JoggerServer when an exception is caught in a request.
Jogger Use this class to configure your application's routes, interceptors, template engine, exception handlers, etc.
JoggerServer A server that handles HTTP requests using the provided Jogger instance.
NotFoundHandler Used by the JoggerServer when the route or static file doesn't exist.
Route Holds the information of a route.
RouteRequestExecutor This class is responsible of executing the interceptors and controller actions when there is a matching route for the HTTP request.
 

Enum Summary
Route.HttpMethod  
 

Exception Summary
RoutesException Generally thrown when a problem occurs loading the routes (different from a parsing error)
 

Package org.jogger Description

Entry point classes (such as Jogger and JoggerServer) used to configure and run a web application.
